title: Find the ratio of $$a_2$$ to $$a_1$$.
text: The ratio of the second term to the first term is $$\frac{8}{12}=\frac{2}{3}$$.

title: Find the ratio of $$a_3$$ to $$a_2$$.
text: The ratio of the third term to the second term is $$\frac{4}{8}=\frac{1}{2}$$.

title: Determining if there is a Common Ratio
text: Since 2/3!=1/2, there is no common ratio, the series is not geometric.

title: Sum of Infinite Geometric Series
text: Since the series is not geometric, the sum is not defined.
